mapper.select: select a.application_seq, a.name, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.open_date, a.status, p.place_name, sc.sub_category_name, f.files_sysname from apply a left outer join place p on a.place_seq = p.place_seq left outer join sub_category sc on a.sub_category_seq = sc.sub_category_seq left outer join files f on a.application_seq = f.files_parent_seq where sc.sub_category_seq = #{category} and f.files_type='poster' and a.status='승인 완료' and sysdate > open_date order by a.application_seq desc

select a.application_seq, a.name, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.open_date, a.status, p.place_name, sc.sub_category_name, f.files_sysname from apply a left outer join place p on a.place_seq = p.place_seq left outer join sub_category sc on a.sub_category_seq = sc.sub_category_seq left outer join files f on a.application_seq = f.files_parent_seq where sc.sub_category_seq = #{category} and f.files_type='poster' and a.status='승인 완료' and open_date > sysdate order by a.application_seq desc

select a.application_seq, a.name, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.open_date, a.status, p.place_name, sc.sub_category_name, f.files_sysname from apply a left outer join place p on a.place_seq = p.place_seq left outer join sub_category sc on a.sub_category_seq = sc.sub_category_seq left outer join files f on a.application_seq = f.files_parent_seq where (#{genre} = '0' OR a.genre_seq = #{genre}) and f.files_type='poster' and a.status='승인 완료' and sysdate > open_date and sc.sub_category_seq=#{category} order by a.application_seq desc

select a.application_seq, a.name, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.open_date, a.status, p.place_name, sc.sub_category_name, f.files_sysname from apply a left outer join place p on a.place_seq = p.place_seq left outer join sub_category sc on a.sub_category_seq = sc.sub_category_seq left outer join files f on a.application_seq = f.files_parent_seq where f.files_type='poster' and a.status='승인 완료' and open_date > sysdate and sub_category_name in ('콘서트', '뮤지컬') order by a.start_date

SELECT r.review_seq, r.application_seq, r.member_id, r.review_title, r.review, r.review_date, s.stars, COUNT(rl.review_seq) AS like_count, a.name, f.files_sysname FROM review r LEFT OUTER JOIN stars s ON r.review_seq = s.review_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN review_like rl ON r.review_seq = rl.review_seq left outer join apply a on r.application_seq = a.application_seq left outer join files f on r.application_seq = f.files_parent_seq GROUP BY r.review_seq,r.application_seq,r.member_id, r.review_title, r.review, r.review_date, s.stars, a.name, f.files_sysname ORDER BY like_count DESC, r.review_date DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.application_seq, a.name, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.open_date, a.status, p.place_name, sc.sub_category_name, f.files_sysname FROM apply a LEFT OUTER JOIN place p ON a.place_seq = p.place_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN sub_category sc ON a.sub_category_seq = sc.sub_category_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN files f ON a.application_seq = f.files_parent_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT o.application_seq, COUNT(o.order_seq) AS order_count FROM orders o WHERE o.order_date >= SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY o.application_seq ) o ON o.application_seq = a.application_seq WHERE f.files_type = 'poster' AND a.status = '승인 완료' AND SYSDATE > a.open_date AND sc.sub_category_name IN (#{category}) ORDER BY o.order_count DESC NULLS LAST, a.start_date ) WHERE 5 >= ROWNUM
